{"id":1086539667,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1698551739,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1086539667/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the K-or of an Array","memory":"28.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool ithBitSetForK(vector<int> arr, int i, int k) {\n        int count=0;\n        for(int x:arr) if(x&(1<<i)) count++;\n        return count>=k;\n    }\n    int countBits(int x) {\n        int count=0;\n        while(x>0) {\n            count++;\n            x>>=1;\n        }\n        return count;\n    }\n    int findKOr(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int kOr=0,maxBitCount=countBits(*max_element(nums.begin(),nums.end()));\n        for(int i=0;i<maxBitCount;i++) \n            if(ithBitSetForK(nums,i,k)) \n                kOr+=pow(2,i);\n        return kOr;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-k-or-of-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
